```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(janitor)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(reshape2)
```

## Intro

```{r}
#read in data 
copr_birds_obs <- read_csv(here("GBIF_bird_obs_clipped.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names()
```

```{r}
copr_birds_obs_species <- copr_birds_obs %>% 
  group_by(species, year)
```


```{r}

#filter data for selected observers  
copr_birds_obs_dates <- copr_birds_obs %>% 
  filter(year >= 2015)

copr_birds_obs_names <- copr_birds_obs %>% 
  filter(recorded_by %in% c("Mark Holmgren", "Dave Comption", "Nick Lethaby", "Tom Turner", "Jasen Liu"))

ider <- c("Mark Holmgren", "Dave Comption", "Nick Lethaby", "Tom Turner", "Jasen Liu")
```
